# HC08_SDCC_SOFTWARE_UART_115200
HC08 core, software UART and timing calculation
spreadsheet, ![HC08_baud_padding_calculation.xlsx](HC08_baud_padding_calculation.xlsx) 

formula
ticks = CPU_MHz / baud * 10^6
padding = ticks - tick
x = padding / 3



```
2018/OCT-22					
HC08 core					
xiaolaba
```
